name: Rahmivasion
description:
Rahmivasion, is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game, where you play as Metio. A farmer that has lived there his whole life and because of that he has grown strong. But one day Metio's world turns around as an alien invasion happens, by the alien called Rahmi. Rahmi comes down to planet Earth and used his device to control all inanimate objects in order to take over world.

Metio is unhappy with that, because it unsettles his daily life, he can no longer use his tractor or watch TV at night, so he decides to take matters into his own hands and defeat Rahmi. Can you help Metio defeat Rahmi?

Download the game and give it a shot!
